Articles.Content: Don't Know if everyone is giving up on the Kethane mod, but Ive recently downloaded the new Kethane 0.9 with KSP 24.2 and still having conversion issues. Ive had KSP for six week now and not have a lot of success down loading any of the mods. Please help

You running Windows or Mac or Linux ? and want all mods you have problems with but first, I don't use Kethane but really don't see what the problem with Converting would be what are you trying to convert ?

Put a fuel tank on top of the converter and show us your setup. Thanks

Also this might interest you.

You running Windows or Mac or Linux ? and want all mods you have problems with but first, I don't use Kethane but really don't see what the problem with Converting would be what are you trying to convert ?

Running Mac, I think that my plugin folder might be corrupted could that be the reason why the mods may not be working? And should i reinstall?

Running Mac, I think that my plugin folder might be corrupted could that be the reason why the mods may not be working? And should i reinstall?

Did you get it to work ?

Did you get it to work ?

No its still not working. Im wondering if there is something wrong with my plugin folder for KSP. I opened the plugin folder up and there is nothing in there. Could that be the problem? maybe I need to reinstall. I have mechjeb2 and its working well but Keathane and KW Rocketry are not working. I have all the parts for Kethane but the converters wont work, and only have limited parts for KW Rocketry. I have not tried to install any other mods just those three, and all mods are up to date with KSP 24.2.
Are you putting the mods in the Plugins, PluginData or GameData folder? Mods go in the GameData folder.

Are you putting the mods in the Plugins, PluginData or GameData folder? Mods go in the GameData folder.

The mods were installed into the Game Data folder. I was trying to see if I pot some in the plugin, plugin data folders and tried to open them up and nothing was in them. That doesn't seem right to me.

The mods were installed into the Game Data folder. I was trying to see if I pot some in the plugin, plugin data folders and tried to open them up and nothing was in them. That doesn't seem right to me.

LOL we talking about KSP/Plugin or KSP/GameData/Kethane/Plugins ?

In KSP/plugin that stays empty but in KSP/GameData/Kethane/Plugins you should have 4 dll files

EDIT- If you can't get it to work you can try this https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Kethane_converter.cfg.zip just put it in KSP/GameData/ ( anywhere in here ) and have 1 ModuleManager.*.*.* file install which you should.

Edited September 22, 2014 by Mecripp2

LOL we talking about KSP/Plugin or KSP/GameData/Kethane/Plugins ?

In KSP/plugin that stays empty but in KSP/GameData/Kethane/Plugins you should have 4 dll files

EDIT- If you can't get it to work you can try this https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Kethane_converter.cfg.zip just put it in KSP/GameData/ ( anywhere in here ) and have 1 ModuleManager.*.*.* file install which you should.

I put in ModuleManager and had some more time to play around with KSP. Kethane and KW Rocketry are working very well. Thank you so much for your help!!
